sessionId.description: sessionId: te identifier of the respective sessions for each client.

requestId.description: requestId: the identifier of the request to which this is a response. The DOIP service must include in its response the requestId provided by the client.

status.description: status: an identifier that indicates the status of the request. Status codes shall have associated unique identifiers resolvable as specified in the IRP.

id.description: id: the identifier of the DO.

type.description: type: the DO type. Must be 0.TYPE/DO or its extension. See Types section.

serviceName.description: the name of the DOIP service.

ipAddress.description: the IP address of the service.

port.description: the listening port on the IP address.

protocolVersion.description: highest version of the DOIP protocol supported.

anyOf.description: the public key expressed in JWK format as a default.

attributes.description: attributes: one or more fields (key-value pairs) serialized as a JSON (sub) object.
